title: Instructional Design Process for Radiation Education Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamentals of Radiation Physics and Basic Principles of Medical Imaging Equipment Operation
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented educational environment utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations.

learning_goals: Perform patient positioning procedures in a simulated environment with 90% accuracy according to radiation safety protocols.
Practice radiation exposure dose calculations and optimization strategies at least three times using virtual reality simulation tools.
Develop and present radiation-related emergency response procedures in a project format within a team-based scenario.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
